info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 02 at 4:11AM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 7 inches or more and ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Broome, Otsego, Chenango, Tioga and Chemung counties. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light mixed precipitation will move into the region Wednesday night and Thursday. The main round of snow, sleet, and freezing rain will be Thursday afternoon and night, transitioning to snow by Friday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
